mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HEENDY_CAR_RESERVATION ( BRANCH_CODE, MEMBER_ID, RESERVATION_TIME, CREATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{branchCode}, #{memberId}, #{reservationTime}, #{createdAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID, BRANCH_CODE, MEMBER_ID, RESERVATION_TIME, CREATED_AT, PICKUP_YN, CANCEL_YN, RETURN_YN FROM HEENDY_CAR_RESERVATION WHERE ID = #{reservationId}

SELECT r.ID, r.RESERVATION_TIME, r.CREATED_AT, r.BRANCH_CODE, b.IMG_URL AS branchImgUrl FROM HEENDY_CAR_RESERVATION r JOIN BRANCH_HEENDY_CAR b ON r.BRANCH_CODE = b.BRANCH_CODE WHERE r.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
